EmailTemplate.name: Get more from NetApp and VMware investments (1494351919.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Get more from NetApp and VMware investments (1494351919.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Mike - From past conversations I have heard that you and the team from Cross County Healthcare made an investment in VMware’s hypervisor and NetApp storage to allow you to scale out your business at a lower costs. I was hoping to discuss with you how our platform Turbonomic enables teams to capitalize on the investment they made in virtualization and storage providers, giving them a way of continue to grow and scale without having to buy more hardware. In short, Turbonomic dynamically and automatically adjusts configuration, resource allocation and workload placement across compute and storage to meet performance demands while utilizing the infrastructure as efficiently as possible, allowing you to: - Reduce ongoing compute/storage costs by 20-30% by optimizing workload placement - Reduce operational costs of problem and incident management by eliminating complex problems with disk space and IO performance contention - Assure application performance and reduce risk by minimizing the contention for CPU, Mem, disk space and IO capacity - Enable more IO-intensive applications to be virtualized reliably, bringing down the overall cost to deliver compute services to the business and customers Turbonomic and NetApp Storage Efficiency Systems <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jEtUecfGL1xQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhXDlazVD%5FfgajIIYJcdvJm1cU8r%2D6gwHQXq4CvpnGeD2cgWUg%2DaA2tXZZyqSfjaJIUeROF3XfKBbMOiwUvqKQr4r%5F%2DUYe37EmqxFDoyweCGVgtse6%5F7Q6QO6A4tYUvtnsQ7FgLcNHszTyX25IvhHU90tZuj04%5Fr%5F1%5FBt1S2D6cWnbv97aqFrxfaofjk%2D%5FYqv8kNgo2vKg7QjyIPV2bIduhdC0owh6AghwbYTxcdAYKDcgihyqcn29YJMECbweOgStxlGgX4IZt967epBWySlfQBxLcojiKllLmb8c%2C/j0pUcszPKFlNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqp0cAzyUlwa6PbPULnhtxdE5UrKPmfExYeFoJyjwJdDuGFbM1T7vpPCka3F2Tyi7Xle4JFLOZr6eBKxaKG21Y3hcmnhkXVTB0oEkBBSwCUY4sLlRjXHLNzWzq%5Fwy6TGJIIqh0bnJQx8buqcYazviCEsBfi]]> I know you are very busy but was hoping you might have 15 minutes over the next few weeks for a quick initial discussion of how this is possible. Do you have any time available over the next couple of weeks? Best regards, James Wilcox Turbonomic <[[https://turbonomic.com/product/#lower-infrastructure-costs]]>C: (508) 479 7516 Email: james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:james.wilcox@turbonomic.com]]> Going to Cisco Live? Meet with a Turbonomic Executive <[[https://turbonomic.com/leadership-meetings]]>
